title: 073 - SoakGate Featuring Darius Butler
description: On today's show, the guys get into an argument about soaking the boys and Foxy tries to grandstand about being the King Super Soaker. The guys also welcome 8 year NFL veteran at DB, Pat's former teammate, a man who will be accompanying him to the ring on Saturday night, Darius Butler. Pat breaks down his experience on the mic in the ring at NXT and what he's looking forward to as we get closer to him sending Adam Cole's head to the International Space Station. Also included from The Pod FOD are strippers in Vegas spreading Covid19, what piece of female clothing/accessory the guys would like to adopt into their wardrobe, some new movie news, and a few more things to help send you into the weekend. Be sure to subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and watch NXT Takeover LIVE on WWE Network at 7 PM EST tomorrow night. Send your questions in to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram to be featured in The Pod FOD. We appreciate you all, have a great weekend and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
